data.client_settings: Canary, Build Number: 14905, Version Hash: ce5fdc33b92af16b60abdadb44a00e70407dd0b3
data.actual_result: Some of the mutual friends/servers get cut off at the bottom
data.expected_result: Should be able to scroll and see all mutual servers/friends with the user
data.short_description: Non-Fullscreen Browser, can't see full list of mutual friends/servers when user has rich presence.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have that user have a rich presence (Fortnite, Spotify, Streaming, ect) - Open discord in browser - Open user profile and shrink window vertically until it resizes their profile - click on mutual servers/friends - scroll down
